abstract: The comments come after Diamond Foods announces it has ousted its top two executives and will restate two years of financial earnings amid questionable accounting practices.
snippet: The comments come after Diamond Foods announces it has ousted its top two executives and will restate two years of financial earnings amid questionable accounting practices.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble said on Wednesday that it could be forced to re-evaluate the sale of its well-known Pringles brand to Diamond Foods, just hours after Diamond Foods announced that it would have to restate two years of financial earnings amid questionable accounting practices.

headline.main: P.&G. Ready to Re-Evaluate Pringles Deal
